text: Gjio Bain (born July 15, 1985) is a Bahamian professional basketball player for San-en NeoPhoenix in Japan. ==References== ==External Links== *Stats in Japan Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Bahamian men's basketball players Category:Bahamian expatriates in Japan Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Hiroshima Lightning players Category:Iwate Big Bulls players Category:Kagoshima Rebnise players Category:Kanazawa Samuraiz players Category:Sportspeople from Nassau, Bahamas Category:Tokyo Cinq Rêves players
title: Gjio Bain
